Meadow Wood RV Park, Glendale, Or. Nice, quiet, shady spot.
At Friendly RV Park, Weed, CA. View of Mt. Shasta. Sunny and warm.
Manzanita Lake Campground, Lassen Volcanic NP. Hiked around lake in sunshine
Driftwood RV Park on banks of Sacramento R. Pretty spot. Sun, low 80s
Jerry's place, Bethel Island, CA., The Delta, Sunny, low 80s
Bethel Is., CA. Incredibly pleasant weather; warm days, cool nights
Bethel Is., CA. Enjoyed visit from Joan and Jason, crew of Mildred Kane
Bethel Is., CA. Taking in a few movies in Antioch, temps mid 90s

Bethel Is., CA. Heading south tomorrow. Temps mid 80s.
Pinnacles National Monument. Volcano split in half by San Andreas Fault

Imperial Beach, drizzling rain, mid 60s
